Communities do not have any imposed KPIs or objectives, which means there’s a huge space for creativity inside such large and serious company. On top of that, to support the development of independent communities, the company created a department for community managers, whose main task is to help implement the community ideas and take over all routine work. Sounds cool, right?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People were, are, and will always be the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"main focus \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"of the communities. Whatever goals the community sets for itself, they are always aimed at improving the community members’ experience inside and outside of
